oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Progress report on desegregation of Chattanooga Public Schools, 1965-1966, 1965 October 8
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Fourth official report created in compliance with a United States District Court order that a progress report be submitted with every annual step in Chattanooga Public School's plan of desegregation. Includes zoning maps for all schools as of the 1965-1966 school year.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Law and legislation; Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga Public Schools (Chattanooga, Tennessee); Chattanooga (Tenn.) Board of Education; United States. District Court (Tennessee : Eastern District)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Chattanooga Board of Education desegregation progress report, 1965 October
Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1965-1969
